roleset.name: bring back to life
roleset.note: RESUSCITATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'resuscitate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from resuscitate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: resuscitate-v: bride of the reanimator
example.text: For his sixth novel, [Mr. Friedman]-1 tried *trace*-1 to resuscitate the protagonist of his 1972 work, ``About Harry Towns.''
example.arg: the protagonist of his 1972 work, ``About Harry Towns

example.name: resuscitate-v: Arg1
example.text: Various efforts were made for his resuscitation, but in vain.

example.name: resuscitation-n: metaphorical, with Arg0,1
example.text: Pastorek's resuscitation of the moribund New Orleans school system, plus the recruitment of Paul Vallas, is remarkable and has drawn the admiration of reformers and educators across the nation.
example.arg: of the moribund New Orleans school system

roleset.name: emergency technique that involves breathing air into another person's lungs

mappings.source: (E / resuscitate-01 :arg0 (n / NARG0) :arg1 (n1 / NARG1) :manner (b2 / be-located-at-91 :arg1 (B / mouth :part-of (n)) :arg2 (D / mouth :part-of (n1))))

roleset.note: MOUTH_TO_MOUTH_RESUSCITATE-M NOTES: Added by Julia in conjunction with Katie and Tim for Lorelei, during initial MWE framing. This roleset is a bit of an outlier because of the size of the phrase and the various light verb forms, including those in which 'resuscitate' is dropped. WordNet 3.0 includes a sense for 'mouth-to-mouth resuscitation'.

example.name: do_mouth-to-mouth_resuscitation-l
example.text: He did mouth-to-mouth resuscitation on her while Goodridge, 17, a senior at Berkmar, did chest compressions.
example.arg: while Goodridge, 17, a senior at Berkmar, did chest compressions

example.name: give_mouth-to-mouth-l
example.text: “I gave her mouth-to-mouth and called for help,” Waneta said.

example.name: mouth-to-mouth_resuscitation-m
example.text: The child was unable to breathe normally, and mouth-to-mouth resuscitation was administered by the police officers who responded to the call for aid.

example.name: resuscitate_mouth_to_mouth-m
example.text: The doctor resuscitated him mouth to mouth. It took twelve minutes to get a first response and twenty minutes before he breathed on his own.

roleset.name: emergency procedure that involves breathing into another person's lungs, while performing chest compressions
roleset.note: CARDIOPULMONARY_RESUSCITATION NOTES: Added by Julia while adding mouth-to-mouth_resuscitate above. Given an individual roleset rather than including in .01 because of the abbreviated form and the distinct WN sense.

example.name: do_cardiopulmonary_resuscitation-l
example.text: Ernie said he did cardiopulmonary resuscitation on his friend until he revived.

example.name: give_CPR-l
example.text: I gave her CPR, but I knew right off she'd been dead for hours.
